A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many online reviewers are acting as though this is the last chapter of the saga rather than the middle installment. Fans need to relax and let this story play out.  Criticizing Rian Johnson for this middle sequel is like criticizing Peter Jackson for killing off Gandalf in the first chapter of LOTR.  Relax people and enjoy the ride.....the best is yet to come.
